de.japi.components.layout

Class Japi2HorizontalFlowLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.FlowLayout
      • de.japi.components.layout.Japi2HorizontalFlowLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, java.io.Serializable

    public class Japi2HorizontalFlowLayout
extends java.awt.FlowLayout
    A custom FlowLayout extension for horizontal flow. This class is adapted from the class JAPI_HFlowLayout in the original JAPI kernel.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setFill

        public final void setFill(boolean fill)
        Sets the fill property.
        Parameters:
        fill - if true the layout components are spread over the entire container width. On false the containers are layed out by their bounds.

      • setOrientation

        public final void setOrientation(int orientation)
        Sets the orientation of the layout.
        Parameters:
        orientation - the orientation.
